name: Charles the Architect
description: Founder of the Citadel. Summon to boost all allied structures’ HP by 30%.

name: Bison Vanguard
description: Tower defender that deals double damage to invading units.

name: Spirit of ADA
description: Channel blockchain energy to restore mana of all allies.

name: The Citadel Gate
description: A defensive relic that prevents first turn damage.

name: Whale of Fortune
description: Gain +3 random resources at the start of each round.

name: Obra Forgemaster
description: Creates one 'Weapon Token' every 2 turns for your army.

name: Cardano Priestess
description: Healer of the chain. Recovers 20% HP of the weakest ally.

name: Soul of the Bison
description: Summon a Bison Guardian for one battle.

name: Hydra Node
description: Increases mana generation rate by 2× for 3 turns.

name: Charles’ Command
description: All Citadel units gain +2 ATK and +1 DEF.

name: Junk Survivor
description: Gains +1 ATK every time a card is destroyed.

name: Eclipse Shard
description: Cancels the effect of the next enemy spell.

name: Bison Island
description: Deploys an island that produces food and metal per turn.

name: Citadel Drone Unit
description: A tech-powered scout that reveals enemy hidden cards.

name: Phantom Coder
description: Hack and copy any one-time ability from an opponent.

name: Token Altar
description: Generate 1 $COC token per victory round.

name: Celestial Chain
description: Prevents your Mythic card from being destroyed once.

name: Deep Catch Leviathan
description: Summon a massive sea creature to devour weakest enemy.

name: Citadel Miner
description: Gain +1 resource per turn while active.

name: The System Core
description: Boosts production of all Citadel buildings by 25%.

name: Frogano Scout
description: Draw 1 extra card when played.

name: Bison King
description: Leader of the Bison clans, grants +3 ATK to all Bison cards.

name: Soul Reactor
description: Converts HP into Mana. High risk, high reward.

name: Mystic Node
description: Search your deck for a 'Tech' or 'Magic' card.

name: Citadel Orbital Cannon
description: Destroy any card on the field. Requires 3 energy tokens.

name: Chain Guardian
description: Immune to destruction by non-magical effects.

name: Cardano Emissary
description: Draw two cards. If one is Legendary, gain 5 credits.

name: Ascendant Charles
description: Ultimate form. Automatically wins if combined with 'Citadel Core'.

name: Defence Protocol: Omega
description: All enemies lose 50% ATK for 2 turns.

name: ADA Genesis Sigil
description: Symbol of balance — reshuffles your graveyard into the deck.

name: Whale Harbor
description: Building — Whale Harbor produces resources each turn and strengthens nearby units.

name: Divine Uptime
description: Spell — Cast Divine Uptime to trigger a one-time effect that shifts tempo.

name: Obra Hammer
description: Relic — While Obra Hammer remains, your resource gain is amplified.
